translations.translation: So remind them! You are only a reminder.
Remind them; you are surely a reminder.
So render good counsel, for you are simply required to counsel,
(Muhammad), preach; you are only a preacher.
Therefore advise; indeed you are a proclaimer of advice. (The Holy Prophet is a Remembrance from Allah.)
So remind them -- you are only one who reminds.
Therefore do remind, for you are only a reminder.
Then remind them! Thou art only a reminder;
Remind them, for thou art but a remembrancer,
So, [O Prophet] exhort them: your task is only to exhort,
Admonish thou then; thou art but an admonisher.
So admonish—for you are only an admonisher,
Therefore do thou give admonition, for thou art one to admonish.
So remind them (O Muhammad (Peace be upon him)), you are only a one who reminds.
Therefore remind, you are only a Reminder.
So remind. You are only a reminder.
So remind, [O Muhammad]; you are only a reminder.
[88:21] So remind, them of God’s graces and the proofs affirming His Oneness. For you are only an admonisher;

(Remind them) admonish them, (for thou art but a remembrancer) you are but a warner by means of the Qur'an; it is also said that this means: you are only an admonisher by the Qur'an and through Allah,

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وبعدما سمعت ما سمعت من كمال قدرة الله { فَذَكِّرْ } يا أكمل الرسل بالقرآن بمقتضى ما أُمرت به وأُلهمت { إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُذَكِّرٌ } [الغاشية: 21] مبلغـ فلا بأس عليك إن لم ينظروا ولم يعتبروا، ما عليك إلاَّ البلاغ، فلا تقصر في تبليغك

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: يقول الحق جلّ جلاله: { فَذَكِّر } الناس بالأدلة العقلية والنقلية، { إنما أنت مُذكِّّر } ليس عليك إلاَّ التبليغ { لستَ عليهم بمصيطرٍ } بمسلط، كقوله:
